altername_name: Mario Kart DS: Custom Tracks Grand Prix Nitro
name: CTGP Nitro
overview: CTGP-Nitro is the biggest, most ambitious Mario Kart DS Rom Hack to date. Instead of replacing the existing tracks, it preserves the whole vanilla experience and adds new tracks, speedrunning quality of life improvements, online mode adjustments, new skins for characters and much more!
